title: New: Spirit of America – Soon
content:
Hard-hitting scuzzy lo-fi from New Hampshire’s Spirit of America, a currently anonymous project with little to no information available online as to the identity of this rather unique vocalist.

His debut track, Soon, is part Coma Cinema, mixed with a far amount of late 80’s, early 90’s grunge. So the quality of the recording is questionable, yet it’s partly this that makes it so loveable; it’s raw and seems to depend upon it’s inadequacies. Check out Soon below.

welcome to hell, boy
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
